velKoz:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
velKoz:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

velKoz:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
velKoz:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
velKoz:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

velKoz:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
velKoz:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

velKoz:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
velKoz:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !velKoz:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

velKoz:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
velKoz:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !velKoz:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

velKoz:VoidRift.NAME: Void Rift
velKoz:VoidRift.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice.

velKoz:EnergyExtract.NAME: Energy Extract
velKoz:EnergyExtract.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the target's current Deconstruction amount. NL Deal !D! damage.
velKoz:EnergyExtract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the target's current Deconstruction amount + 1. NL Deal !D! damage.

velKoz:ZhenDangLianJi.NAME: Zhen Dang Lian Ji
velKoz:ZhenDangLianJi.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. For each stack of Deconstruction, deal !D! damage again.

velKoz:XuNengBaoPo.NAME: Xu Neng Bao Po
velKoz:XuNengBaoPo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it causes Organic Deconstruction to explode, gain !B! Block.

velKoz:AnatomicalMastery.NAME: Anatomical Mastery
velKoz:AnatomicalMastery.DESCRIPTION: Organic Deconstruction explodes when stacking to 2.

velKoz:DualDeconstrucion.NAME: Dual Deconstrucion
velKoz:DualDeconstrucion.DESCRIPTION: Each time you attack, apply 2 stacks of Deconstruction.

velKoz:PlasmaFission.NAME: Plasma Fission
velKoz:PlasmaFission.DESCRIPTION: This turn, all "strike"s are split into two separate hits, one maintaining the original damage, and the other dealing half of the original damage.

velKoz:TectonicDisruption.NAME: Tectonic Disruption
velKoz:TectonicDisruption.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Deconstruction and !velKoz:SecondMagic! Weak to an enemy.
